text: dopers were living in a nest on the
branch of a tree they were not happy and
they live a very unhappy life they were
sad because they could not hatch their
eggs
there was a snake living nearby then the
crows went in search of food
the snake used to sneak into the nest
and break and drink the eggs the crows
were furry since it happened not once or
twice but many times so they thought
about the Fox and went to seek his help
on seeing them the Fox came out of his
cave
hello it's all right were children what
happened
they must be some reason for your
arrival so both the crows narrated their
worries we thought of shifting to
another gene but before that we just
can't seek your advice do not run away
from your troubles you have to face it
courageously
to get a good result if you listen and
follow my advice your enemies will
vanish
both the crows nodded their heads and
said that they will follow his advice
next day when the main crow went hunting
for food it saw the princes it saw her
keeping the pearl necklace on the
riverbank before she went to have a bath
within seconds
the group came down and took the pearl
necklace and flew away
on seeing this the princess shouted Oh
my pearl necklace God's catch the grow
change it don't leave it you will not be
allowed to enter the palace without the
pearl necklace scared by the princess
order the guards ran in all directions
chasing the crow as it flew the crow
dropped the necklace in the snakes hole
on seeing this the guard started digging
his makes hole the snake came out
fiercely at this moment one of the
guards kill the snake with his sward
then the guards took the pearl necklace
from the hole and went back to the
palace the crows were watching the whole
incident from the treetops and felt very
happy after this the crows laid eggs and
hatched them we thanked the Fox and
lived happily ever after
modern weakness can be won over only by
conspiracy we must always be alone we do
not have to perspire but we should not
fall as a prey to others conspiracy
